title: Bye bye boards
body:
Some of you are too biased and won't have an honest discussion when presented with one yet ruin it for everyone else. In the long run it will ruin it for the majority. Played this game since Season 1 and let me tell you, this boards community(not everyone but a select few, a very noisy few) is far more toxic than the game. So long{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Won't be reading comments so get as filthy as you can

replies.body: This thread is more appropriate for Let's Talk: Boards as opposed to Gameplay, as this doesn't adhere to the Gameplay guidelines. As such, I'll be closing out this discussion. If anyone would like to continue this discussion, I would definitely encourage doing so in the Let's Talk: Boards section.
